title: Send notification to groups
content:
You can send the notification to the groups using the Send notification rule template.

​​​​Simple rule:

When you select the recipients in the Send notification rule template, you can add the assignment group as the recipients from the drop-down list.

Expression Language:

Alternatively, you can use the Expression Language mode to send a notification to the assignment group of a record.

Here is an example:

Send emails to group PDLs for large groups

If a group has a lot of members, you should do the following to make the system send emails to the group PDL instead of individual users:

  • Specify an email for the group on the Group page.
  • Select the use group email flag on the notification template.

Note: If you don't use the group PDL method, the system sends notifications to email addresses of group members individually, and this method supports 1,000 group members at maximum. If you add a group that has more than 1,000 members, some members will not receive email notifications due to this limit.
